## Intermediate2Options.srcGlobs property

Process output files glob. Glob for `gulp.src` for reading files from [output](./gulp-intermediate2.intermediate2options.output.md) temp directory after processing.

**Signature:**

```typescript
srcGlobs?: string | string[];
```
